text: Karaslavov () is a Bulgarian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Asen Karaslavov (born 1980), former Bulgarian footballer * Georgi Karaslavov (1904–1980), Bulgarian writer * Slav Khristov Karaslavov (1932–2002), Bulgarian writer, journalist and poet == References == Category:Bulgarian- language surnames
title: Karaslavov
